data.name: Armada Demo
data.detailed_description: This demo will contain the entirety of the base game until the game is fully released. The reason for this is because I want the game to be avaliable to as many people as possible, while also allowing for people to buy the game, similar to a donation, if you enjoy the content I provide or plan to provide for the game. Eventually, the community will be required to purchase the game and the demo will cease being updated, but for a long while will be the exact same as the purchased copy.
data.about_the_game: This demo will contain the entirety of the base game until the game is fully released. The reason for this is because I want the game to be avaliable to as many people as possible, while also allowing for people to buy the game, similar to a donation, if you enjoy the content I provide or plan to provide for the game. Eventually, the community will be required to purchase the game and the demo will cease being updated, but for a long while will be the exact same as the purchased copy.
data.short_description: Simplistic naval warfare game with PvP combat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Above
  • Processor: Intel I5 or Above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 500 series or similar
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
